title: Does anyone else feel this way?
body:
When the Mordekaiser rework happened, I told my friend (who loved playing Mordekaiser) that he had been reworked and that he was really OP. He told me he liked his kit the way it was and didn't want it to be changed, despite how underused he was, like Yorick (as he also played Yorick).

I didn't understand this for a while (why wouldn't you want your favourite champion to be buffed?) when I thought about Shaco. I am very familiar with and love his kit. I wouldn't want it to change. Also, since Shaco is an off-meta pick (like Mordekaiser and Yorick), I wouldn't be one of the only few Shaco mains/players out there, since more people would play the champion if it was stronger.

Does anyone else feel this way?

Dang this post sounded so much better in my head and then I tried to type and I think I failed a bit.
